GERRY was founded in 1946 as a solution to people’s outdoor needs. The brand’s innovative outdoor apparel was born on the mountains of Colorado and has inspired today’s active performance wear.

May 23, 2024 - In 2010, the Gerry brand was bought by Studio Ray, of New York City which revamped the catalog, which included their classic outerwear and accessories. In Fall 2012, Gerry began to be sold at retailers, including Macy's, Dillard's, and The Sports Authority. Their lightweight jackets and other ...
